survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Electric Scooter Sharing Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric scooter sharing services to improve service quality, user experience, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an electric scooter sharing service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Limit selections to 3 to prioritize key factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes with max 3 selections)

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an electric scooter sharing service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the pricing of the electric scooter sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the pricing of the electric scooter sharing service?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the electric scooter sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the electric scooter sharing service?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using the electric scooter sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no format. Follow up with Q6 if 'Yes' is selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons with conditional routing)

script.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using the electric scooter sharing service?

questions.question_text: Please describe the safety concern you experienced.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q5 is answered with 'Yes'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture specific safety issues. Ensure text box is large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT (text area with conditional display)

script.question_text: Please describe the safety concern you experienced.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q5 is answered with 'Yes'
